articles.author: Alex Milne
articles.title: Shkodran Mustafi explains how Mikel Arteta has improved Arsenal despite unhappy players - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Gunners' results have picked up since the former Manchester City assistant coach took over from Unai Emery and Mustafi has lifted the lid on his impact
articles.content:
Arsenal defender Shkodran Mustafi says manager Mikel Arteta has been "incredible" since taking over at the club, but admits his squad are not always happy.
Arteta took charge in December following the sacking of Unai Emery, who reportedly alienated a number … [+2153 chars]

articles.title: Celtic should follow Juventus but Rangers obsession kills any chance - blogger - Daily Record
articles.description: Our resident Rangers fan blogger isn't happy with the way events have panned out in recent weeks.
articles.content:
As families across Scotland struggle with circumstances the coronavirus has foisted upon them, Scottish football has gone above and beyond to show exactly why the English and other outsiders view the league set-up we have as a joke.

articles.author: Joe Ganley
articles.title: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer deserves great credit says Man Utd Treble hero Jesper Blomqvist - Manchester United
articles.description: Our former Swedish winger is full of admiration and appreciation for the tough decisions Solskjaer has made as manager.
articles.content: Manchester United Treble-hero Jesper Blomqvist has paid tribute to the work Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is doing as the club's manager, claiming the Norwegian deserves credit for making brave, selfless decisions.

articles.content:
